title: Are there situations where I would not have a right of rescission?
main_content: For example, you do not have the right of rescission when:Your loan is used to purchase or build your principal homeYou consolidate or refinance with the same creditor a loan that is already secured by your home, and no additional funds are borrowedA state agency is the creditor for the loan
key_message: The right of rescission does not apply in every case where your home is used as collateral for the loan.
